welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Troutdale, a charming city known as the gateway to the Columbia River Gorge. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for United Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Lufthansa, and Icelandair.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cascade Locks/Stevens Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cascade Locks/Stevens Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport offers domestic flights to various destinations within the United States.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights for business and leisure travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for cargo and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
